did.head: Collection Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.persname: Smith College. Dept. of Biological Sciences.

did.abstract: Records include information regarding committees, courses, exams, department memos, minutes from department meetings, as well as information and publicity regarding lectures and symposiums sponsored by the department. There is also information regarding the Sigma Xi Society and the H.H. Wilder Collection.

scopecontent.p: The Biological Sciences Department papers, 1912- present, contain materials regarding committees, courses, (including Genetics, Marine Biology, Paleobiology, and Zoology) exams, department memos, minutes from department meetings, as well as information and publicity regarding lectures and symposiums sponsored by the department. There is also information regarding the Sigma Xi Society and the H.H. Wilder Collection. These files were maintained by B. Elizabeth Horner and transferred to the Smith College Archives over a period of time.

userestrict.p: Smith College owns copyright to any published material relating to college events and activities. Provenance and copyright ownership of other materials is unknown and researchers are responsible for determining any question of copyright. Single photocopies may be made for research purposes. Permission to publish material from the 52.Departments: Biological Sciences must be requested from the Smith College Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please use the following format when citing materials from this collection:
Smith College Dept. of Biological Sciences Files, Box #, Smith College Archives.

controlaccess.head: Search Terms
controlaccess.corpname: Smith College. Dept of Biological Sciences.
Sigma Xi, the Scientific Research Society. Smith College Chapter.
